page.title: 08RECREATION FOR ADULTS
page.content: For many people this is at home, watching{television, gardening,}doing {home improvements. However, there are organisations to cater for everyone in the village. In sport there is an old-established {cricket club,}a{bowls club, tennis, {badminton,}a newly-revived{football {club, ladies'keep-fit group,}and there is a{ramblers' group. There are 4 public houses: the Swan, the Coopers' Arms and the Falcon in Woore, and the Chetwode Arms in Pipe Gate. These serve meals as well as drinks, and darts, dominoes and snooker are played variously. The{Women's Institute}meets monthly. There is a{flower-arranging}group, a {bridge club}and a{Good Companions' Club for older people. The{Woore Variety Artistes}have been producing amateur shows for 4 years.
